actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-634.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 393 - 5 (Record Vote No: 175).

official_title: A resolution to provide for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4175) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1987 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation and the Federal Maritime Commission.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4175 (maritime programs).

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4175) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1987 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation and the Federal Maritime Commission.
